description:
Blue dominates.  Plain weave or Twill variation.
Med blue & green, olive warp. Lt blue, teal, metallic green weft.Pain weave variation. Right selvedge. Stapled to 8.5x11" card.  "H-8B" written on card. Similar to Pomegranite.
